experiences: Developed mobile (Flutter) and web applications, ensuring seamless user experiences.
Built a scalable backend with Java Spring Boot, optimizing performance and security.
Implemented gRPC & HTTP APIs, improving efficiency and system communication.

title: Animated Landing page
description: A modern Framer Motion-based website showcasing smartwatches with hover animations, glowing drop shadows, and animated navigation. Built with Tailwind CSS and deployed on Netlify.

title: Y-NOT Clothing Site
description: A full-stack MERN application for a clothing store featuring secure user authentication, product catalog, cart system, and Stripe integration for payments.

title: Bento Layout for iPhone Accessories
description: A sleek, modern web layout inspired by the Bento style used by Apple to showcase iPhone accessories. Features modular grid sections.
